MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL72 postcode area of Moelfre, affecting properties in Mor Awelon and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:20PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:36PM on 19th April 2021.
